item.title: 投资者最新消息引发派息疑虑后，Adecco 大跌 10
item.description: Adecco Group AG 在资本市场日上提出了令投资者失望的新战略，之后该公司股价暴跌 10%。【原文：Adecco Group AG’s stock plummeted 10% after the company presented a new strategy at its capital-markets day that disappointed investors.】

item.title: 据说字节跳动将重启 Moonton 出售计划，与 PIF 的 Savvy Games 进行谈判
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，TikTok 的所有者字节跳动有限公司（ByteDance Ltd. ）正在洽谈将游戏工作室上海月腾科技有限公司（Shanghai Moonton Technology Co.【原文：TikTok owner ByteDance Ltd. is in talks to sell gaming studio Shanghai Moonton Technology Co. to Saudi Arabia-based Savvy Games Group, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 欧尔班扩大选举开支后缩小匈牙利民调差距
item.description: 匈牙利总理维克托-欧尔班（Viktor Orban）在选举前采取了一系列支出举措，开始缩小反对党在民调中的领先优势。【原文：Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orban is starting to narrow a wide opposition lead in polls on the back of a series of pre-election spending initiatives.】

item.title: 谢因面临欧盟要求限制销售性玩偶和武器的压力
item.description: 本月早些时候，法国当局举报了Shein第三方市场上的儿童性玩偶和武器产品，Shein正面临欧盟的压力，要求其遏制这些产品的销售。【原文：Shein is under pressure from the European Union to curb sales of childlike sex dolls and weapons on its third-party marketplace after French authorities reported the products earlier this month.】

item.title: 美国申请失业救济人数降至四月中旬以来最低水平
item.description: 美国失业救济金申请人数上周意外降至 4 月中旬以来的最低点，在经济不确定性的背景下保持相对低迷。【原文：Applications for US unemployment benefits unexpectedly fell last week to the lowest since mid-April, remaining relatively subdued amid economic uncertainty.】

item.title: Lutnick 和 Pomp SPAC 交易面临加密货币暴跌的考验
item.description: 那些急于对加密货币财务公司进行交易的特殊目的收购公司正面临着一个关键时刻。【原文：The special purpose acquisition companies that rushed to make deals for cryptocurrency treasury firms are facing a critical juncture.】

item.title: 萨科齐推翻竞选超支判决的最后一搏失利
item.description: 法国前总统尼古拉-萨科齐（Nicolas Sarkozy）因涉嫌选举资金阴谋刚刚出狱，但他又因在 2012 年竞选连任失败时超支而被判定有罪，在推翻另一项有罪判决的最后一次努力中败下阵来。【原文：Former French President Nicolas Sarkozy, freshly out of jail over an alleged electoral funding conspiracy, has lost his final bid to overturn a separate guilty finding for overspending in his failed 2012 re-election campaign.】

item.title: 赛峰集团计划到 2030 年将印度采购量提高 400
item.description: 法国航空发动机制造商赛峰集团（Safran SA）将在2030年前把从印度采购的零部件翻五番，达到5亿欧元（5.79亿美元），这凸显了印度作为一个主要航空市场的地位正在不断提升。【原文：French aircraft engine maker Safran SA will quintuple component procurement from India to €500 million ($579 million) by 2030, highlighting the country’s rising stature as a major aviation market.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长金多斯在银行寻求救助时提出资本 "红线 "问题
item.description: 欧洲中央银行（European Central Bank）副行长路易斯-德金多斯（Luis de Guindos）发出了迄今为止最强烈的信号之一，即正在努力减轻银行监管负担的高官们不会削弱银行的财务实力。【原文：European Central Bank Vice President Luis de Guindos gave one of the starkest signals yet that top officials who are working to lighten the regulatory burden on banks won’t water down their financial strength.】

item.title: 通胀迅速放缓，加纳第三次降低利率
item.description: 加纳央行连续第三次降息，预计通胀将继续放缓。【原文：Ghana’s central bank delivered a third consecutive interest-rate cut with inflation projected to continue to slow.】

item.title: Pimco 出售陷入困境的巴西电信运营商 Oi 的股份
item.description: 太平洋投资管理公司（Pacific Investment Management Company）出售了其在 Oi SA 的全部股份，原因是这家陷入困境的巴西电信运营商与债权人之间的纠纷旷日持久。【原文：Pacific Investment Management Company sold its entire stake in Oi SA amid a protracted debacle involving the troubled Brazilian telecom operator its creditors.】

item.title: 监督机构称刚果钴出口禁令结束后仍未恢复
item.description: 刚果民主共和国政府监管机构称，在禁止出口钴的禁令失效近六周后，该国仍未批准恢复钴出口。【原文：The Democratic Republic of Congo is yet to authorize a resumption of cobalt exports, almost six weeks after a ban on shipments lapsed, according to a government regulator.】

item.title: 英国财政报告称，英国保留石油天然气暴利税对产业造成打击
item.description: 英国政府将继续对北海石油和天然气生产商征收备受争议的暴利税，直至本十年结束，驳斥了有关征税损害投资和就业的抱怨。【原文：The UK government will stick with a controversial windfall tax for North Sea oil and gas producers until the end of the decade, dismissing complaints that the levy hurts investment and jobs.】

item.title: 瑞士政府拒绝 PE 巨头阻止欧盟交易的申请
item.description: 瑞士政府呼吁选民拒绝接受伙伴集团创始人支持的一场运动，该运动旨在阻止一项旨在改革与欧盟关系的广泛协议生效。【原文：Switzerland’s government called on voters to reject a campaign backed by the founders of Partners Group, which aims to prevent a broad deal to revamp relations with the European Union taking effect.】

item.title: 南非为所有牛接种口蹄疫疫苗
item.description: 南非计划为其全部 700 多万头牛群接种疫苗，以控制非洲大陆最大牛肉生产国的口蹄疫。【原文：South Africa plans to vaccinate its entire herd of more than 7 million cattle in an effort to contain foot-and-mouth disease in the continent’s biggest beef producer.】

item.title: 加拿大将抑制钢铁进口，加强木材援助，应对关税冲击
item.description: 加拿大将收紧钢铁进口规则，并为木材生产商提供更多财政帮助，旨在遏制美国关税所针对的两个行业的损失。【原文：Canada will tighten the rules on steel imports and offer more financial help for lumber producers, aiming to stem losses in two industries targeted by US tariffs.】

item.title: 英国中央财政预算局就提前发布影响市场的文件道歉
item.description: 英国预算责任办公室对史无前例地提前发布预算文件表示歉意，并展开了调查。【原文：Britain’s Office for Budget Responsibility has apologized for an unprecedented early release of its budget documents and launched an investigation.】

item.title: 阿联酋武器制造商称本土防空系统是当务之急
item.description: 阿拉伯联合酋长国最大的武器制造商表示，开发防空系统是其当务之急，这凸显了海湾国家对无人机袭击的日益担忧。【原文：The United Arab Emirates’ largest weapons manufacturer says developing an air-defense system is its top priority, underscoring the Gulf nation’s growing worries of drone attacks.】

item.title: 屡次预测失误后，印度央行副行长为通胀预测辩护
item.description: 印度中央银行的一位高级官员为其预测模型进行了辩护，因为今年的通胀率一直未达到预期，这促使人们对其预测进行了仔细审查。【原文：A top official at India’s central bank defended its forecasting models after consistent misses on inflation this year prompted scrutiny of its projections.】

item.title: 詹姆斯-卡梅隆投资 10 亿美元的英国电影制片厂获得绿灯
item.description: 由《阿凡达》导演詹姆斯-卡梅隆（James Cameron）支持的耗资 7.5 亿英镑（约合 9.85 亿美元）的电影制片厂已获得英国政府的批准，政府推翻了地方议会最初反对该制片厂的决定。【原文：A £750 million ($985 million) film studio backed by Avatar director James Cameron has been greenlit by the UK government, which overruled an initial decision against the studio by the local council.】

item.title: 从 "局外人 "到囚犯：巴西银行家的突然堕落
item.description: 丹尼尔-沃卡洛（Daniel Vorcaro）曾在巴西金融界叱咤风云。他曾是一家地区电视网的福音节目主持人，突然间与巴西的银行业精英们打成一片，举办的奢华派对充斥着八卦专栏，同时在世界各地积累了大量战利品房产。【原文：For a hot moment, Daniel Vorcaro seemed to have made it in the tight-knit world of Brazilian finance. Once the host of a gospel show on a regional TV network, he was suddenly hobnobbing with the country’s banking elite, throwing lavish parties that filled gossip columns while amassing a trove of trophy properties around the world.】

item.title: 被 Trafigura 指控的交易商称 "没有欺骗
item.description: 普拉蒂克-古普塔（Prateek Gupta）称，特拉菲古拉集团（Trafigura Group）在一起巨大的镍矿诈骗案中诈骗了近 6 亿美元。【原文：Prateek Gupta, the man who Trafigura Group says defrauded it of almost $600 million in an enormous nickel scam, said that executives at the trading house were aware many of the cargoes shipped to it did not contain the goods they were supposed to.】

item.title: 投资者对预算计划不以为然，英国债券和英镑大幅波动
item.description: 由于投资者质疑政府财政紧缩计划的可信度，周三英国债券和英镑在涨跌之间摇摆不定。【原文：UK bonds and the pound swung between gains and losses on Wednesday as investors questioned the credibility of the government’s fiscal tightening plans.】

item.title: 中国能源转型进入新篇章，可能变得一团糟
item.description: 北京正在尝试新的解决方案，以避免清洁能源引擎停滞不前。【原文：Beijing is experimenting with new solutions to keep its clean power engine from stalling.】

item.title: 巴西通胀率降至 15%以下的目标范围
item.description: 由于紧缩的货币政策使需求降温，巴西 11 月份月中通胀率自 1 月份以来首次放缓至目标区间。【原文：Brazil’s mid-month inflation slowed to the target range earlier in November for the first time since January as tight monetary policy cools demand.】

item.title: 欧洲央行的危险警告加剧了对稳定性的担忧
item.description: 今年 11 月份的金融稳定报告相当暗淡【原文：This year’s round of November financial stability reports has been pretty bleak】

item.title: TikTok 在边滚动边购物方面取得了巨大成功
item.description: 欢迎收看 Tech In Depth，这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日时事通讯。今天，库尔特-瓦格纳（Kurt Wagner）将探讨 TikTok 的电子商务努力--TikTok Shop--的成功萌芽。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Kurt Wagner looks at the budding success of TikTok’s e-commerce effort, TikTok Shop.】

item.title: 英国财政报告称，英国将主要财政规则的缓冲资金提高至 220 亿英镑
item.description: 根据预算责任办公室提前发布的预测，英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）能够将财政缓冲资金扩大到220亿英镑（约合290亿美元）。【原文：Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves was able to expand her fiscal buffer to £22 billion ($29 billion), according to an early release of the Office for Budget for Responsibility forecast.】

item.title: 特朗普宣称的美国投资热潮在审视下显得小了很多
item.description: 彭博社分析显示，特朗普夸大了投资承诺意外之财的三倍【原文：Bloomberg analysis shows Trump is overstating investment pledge windfall by a factor of three】

item.title: 美国购房申请飙升至 2023 年以来最高点
item.description: 尽管借贷成本依然高企，美国的购房抵押贷款申请上周仍猛增至 2023 年初以来的最高水平。【原文：US mortgage applications to buy a home surged last week to the highest level since early 2023, despite still-elevated borrowing costs.】
